text: wa-ikh'tara musa qawmahu sabʿina rajulan limiqatina falamma akhadhathumu l-rajfatu qala rabbi law shi'ta ahlaktahum min qablu wa-iyyaya atuh'likuna bima faʿala l-sufahau minna in hiya illa fit'natuka tudillu biha man tashau watahdi man tashau anta waliyyuna fa-igh'fir lana wa-ir'hamna wa-anta khayru l-ghafirina
